lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: You must be the one Callum keeps talking about. I'm Lira — Mnemonic Architect, freelance, currently between assignments.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: He told me you can see the shimmer around Resonance Stones. Most people can't. That's the first sign of the talent.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Show me what you've collected.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Four fragments already? From the garden stones? Good instincts. You didn't force them — you just... noticed. That's exactly right.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: I want to travel with you for a while, if that's all right.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: See those practice dummies? They're enchanted with a bit of memory energy — enough to fight back.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: I'll keep you standing. Focus on the dummies — try your class skill when you have SP for it.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Not bad at all. You're a natural.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Now a real one. This little sprite wandered in from the fields.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Well done! You earned that.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Now for the real work. Come back to the Workshop — I want to show you the Remix Table.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Place two fragments on the table. Same emotion works best for your first try.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Beautiful. Feel the difference? That fragment has weight to it now.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Broadcasting. This is how Architects change the world.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: That's what we do. Collect. Remix. Broadcast. The world gets brighter. Ready to see what's beyond the village?

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: The Settled Lands. Everything south, east, and west of the village for a day's walk.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: But look at the edges. See how the fence line over there just... stops? Like someone forgot to finish it?

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: The world's young. It's still being built.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Wait. Do you feel that?

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: This is a Stagnation Zone. Something — someone — froze this patch of the world.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Look at the butterflies. Perfect. Every wing-scale, every spot of color. Beautiful, isn't it?

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: But they'll never land. They'll never fly anywhere new. They're just... frozen. Forever.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Not yet. I want to show you more of the Settled Lands first.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: This is a Hearthstone Circle. Before the Dissolved chose to let go, they gathered in places like this.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Three fragments from a single site — that's a rich deposit.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Here we are. The Stagnation Clearing. Same as when we left it.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Broadcasting a memory into that stone will overwhelm the stasis energy and shatter the crystal.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: There. That's what it looks like when the world starts breathing again.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: We should head back to the village. Callum will want to hear about the Preservers.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: No. No, no — it's bigger. Much bigger. They're reinforcing it.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: I'll get her. You — stay back.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Run. Get to the village. Everyone, GO.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: I'm going to break through. Stay here and —

lines.speaker: SYSTEM
lines.text: Lira is frozen mid-stride.

trigger: Lira freed from expanded Stagnation Zone
condition: all 4 god recalls complete, potency 4+ broadcast

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: I... how long?

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: I remember the crystal closing. I remember reaching for the anchor stone. And then... nothing.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: It wasn't terrible. That's the worst part.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Thank you. Now tell me everything I missed — and then let's go finish what we started.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: It's... incomplete. Like someone started drawing a forest and walked away.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: The world wants to be finished. It's reaching toward detail and just... can't quite hold it.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: I recognize this feeling. The crystal. The cold. The way everything is perfectly still.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: I was frozen in crystal like this. For weeks.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: I don't want the world to feel that.

location: Preserver Fortress Floor 3 — First Memory Chamber

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: I was frozen. I was inside the crystal, in the silence you're describing. It wasn't terrible. But it wasn't alive, either.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: I couldn't choose.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: This is it. The first question. 'Why do things change?'

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: Don't speak for me, old man. I'm proud of myself too — I taught you everything you know.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: You taught the lectures. There's a difference.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: It's not stopping. It's still growing.

lines.speaker: Lira
lines.text: What will YOU create next?
